text: Kenneth Arthur McDonald (1928-2015), was a male weightlifter who competed for England. ==Weightlifting career== He represented Australia at the 1952 Summer Olympics finishing in sixth place in the middle-heavyweight category. He represented England and won a gold medal in the -110 Kg combined category at the 1958 British Empire and Commonwealth Games in Cardiff, Wales. He was a member of the YMCA Club in central London from 1950 until 1980. ==References== Category:1928 births Category:2015 deaths Category:English male weightlifters Category:Australian male weightlifters Category:Commonwealth Games medallists in weightlifting Category:Commonwealth Games gold medallists for England Category:Weightlifters at the 1958 British Empire and Commonwealth Games Category:Olympic weightlifters of Australia Category:Weightlifters at the 1952 Summer Olympics
title: Ken McDonald (weightlifter)
